\subsection{Detailed Description}
Commonly used routines in Matrix Handler's modules. This module implements the commonly used routines in matrix handler's modules.

\begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
These routines are usually for the library's internal use and should not normally be called directly by users. 

Called by \hyperlink{poski__MatrixHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Matrix\-Handler.\-c}
\end{DoxyAttention}
